name: Amy W. Apon
content: Amy W. Apon, Ph.D. Amy W. Apon, Ph.D. Professor, Computer Science School of Computing 100 McAdams Hall Clemson, SC 29634 Phone: 864-656-3444 Fax: 864-656-0145 Email: aapon at clemson.edu Amy W. Apon, Ph.D. I am on full-time leave from Clemson to the National Science Foundation where I serve as a Program Manager in CISE/OAC. I am not accepting new students at this time. My areas of research interest include cloud computing, performance modeling and analysis of parallel and distributed system, data-intensive computing, emerging parallel architectures, and impact of high performance computing to research competiveness. Last modified July, 2022.
